FuncDef: This command enables checking for zero values in fields specified to be zero by the RIPv1 and RIPv2 specifications.

ParaDef.Info: Enables checking of the mandatory zero fields in the RIPv1 and RIPv2 specifications and rejecting non-compliant RIP messages.
Disables the checking and allows the receipt of RIP messages even if the mandatory zero fields are non-zero.
